name: vRadio™ChannelSunsetStrip
0:
”Alexa, start Sunset Strip”
”Alexa, launch Sunset Strip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sunset strip
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sunset Strip is a vRadio™ Channel is brought to you exclusively by Voxprotocol.com. This vRadio™ Channel can take a boring, ordinary party and make it a total banger of a gathering. With no headaches or hassles, no costs, or subscription fees. You just say, "Alexa, launch Sunset Strip..." to your smart-speaker or Alexa mobile app and let the music rock you.

vRadio™ Channel Sunset Strip plays the incredible music from the absolute Decade of Decadence, which was the insane 1980s Sunset Strip hair metal scene. Bands like: Mötley, Ratt, W.A.S.P., Faster Pussycat, L.A. Guns, Hanoi Rocks, and so many more!

Sadly, traditional radio stations have given up on this genre of music because it doesn't make them enough money. But here at Voxprotocol, we believe that all eras & music genres have value and deserve to be heard by the listeners who wanna rock.

So it's time to tune in, turn it up and be prepared to have nothing but a good time as your ears take a joyride through some of the biggest and best songs of the 1980s hair metal music scene!

CONTROLS:
.) To pause the music, you can say, "Alexa, Pause" then "Alexa, Resume" to pick up where you left off
.) Say "Alexa, Next" to skip to the next track
.) Say "Alexa, Previous" to go back to the last track
.) To stop the music, you can say, "Alexa, Stop."

PLAYLISTS:
.) Sunset Strip playlists can be found at:
https://www.voxprotocol.com/SunsetStrip

FEEDBACK AND CONNECT:
We are super active and available (DMs are always open) to answer questions or find new friends on our preferred social at:

https://twitter.com/Voxprotocol

If you experience any issues or have a usage question, don't hesitate to get in touch with support directly at Support@voxprotocol.com

We are continually updating and improving our Alexa skills and value our users' input! So if you have a comment, suggestion, question, or want to say, "Hey!" please reach out to us at Alexa@voxprotocol.com

INFORM:
.) Voxprotocol music and radio streaming skills may occasionally include strong profanity and sexual or suggestive themes.
.) Voxprotocol music and radio streaming skills include in-skill audio advertisements

EXCLUSIVELY ON THE FOLLOWING DEVICES:
Alexa Mobile App (iOS & Android phones)
Echo Auto
Fire TV Stick
Fire TV Cube
Echo Dot
Echo Spot
Echo Show
Echo Studio
Echo Look
Echo Plus

ABOUT US:
Sunset Strip is a vRadio™ Channel brought to you by Voxprotocol.com - the creators of vRadio™.

All you have to do is say a few easy-to-remember words to your Alexa-powered smart-speaker/device and fabulous music from any era and genre plays! No headaches, no hassles, no building playlists, or paying subscription fees to companies that don't compensate the bands/artists fairly. Just say a few words to your Alexa-powered device, and you get music from the vRadio™ Channel you selected. Voxprotocol does all the AI, Machine Learning & Natural Language Understanding, and you do the listening!

*You can find a complete listing of all of our vRadio™ Channels at: voxprotcol.com/vRadio

Please support us by enjoying our other vRadio™ Channels as well.

Check some of them out by saying:

"Alexa, launch BraveWords Radio..." - BraveWords Radio is a fabulous extension of the destination website BraveWords.com. BraveWords Radio is always playing some of the most awesome hard rock and heavy metal music ever recorded.

and

"Alexa, launch Totally Awesome 80s..." - Time to travel back to the future of great pop culture, including some of the best movies, music, and TV shows. A decade often associated with nostalgia and the style and memories of the time, which continue to live on here on the vRadio™ Channel: Totally Awesome 80s.

"It's Happening Hear!"
